item.title: Mentioned by Sackville Tribune Post
item.description:
MP visits Open Sky farm
Local MP Dominic LeBlanc paid a visit last week to Sackville's Open Sky Co-operative. LeBlanc enjoyed a breakfast meeting with staff, volunteers, board members and program participants, as well as with the Sackville United Church Outreach Committee, ...
